name: Double Balance
description:
Game created for Brackeys Game Jam (Also my first jam), i've created two player platformer that can be fun for your friends or family. I hopy you'll enjoy playing!

Music Used:

- Patrick Patrikios - Jukebox

-Finalfix - Ningen
